[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/grid-pro](./grid-pro.md) &gt; [GridPro](./grid-pro.gridpro.md) &gt; [withStatusBar](./grid-pro.gridpro.withstatusbar.md)

## GridPro.withStatusBar property

Enables or disables the grid status bar.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withStatusBar: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Default is false. When disabled, no status bar will be displayed regardless of statusBarConfig. This requires AG Grid Enterprise module to be available for the status bar to be displayed when enabled.
